page.title: 07The Local Library Service.
page.content: The library advertises local events, for example, A Carnival and An Art and Crafts Fayre.Newcomers to the area can obtain useful information about local doctors or dentists.The library supplies booklets from the Department of Health and Social Security for people's needs. The library also has a book lending service. There are fiction and non-fiction books for juniors and adults .It has a cassette and record lending service and some big libraries have a video library. The library also has a reference room which has books to refer to such as" Who's who", Encyclopaedias and newspapers. Any member of the public can join the library by filling in a form. Children must have the signature of a parent. There is also a meeting room for adult classes.
